title: Katherine Musallam Environmental science-Erosion and ranching practices   Feb. 18-22

subtasks: Discuss the process of soil erosion
Explain how crops and plants protect soil from erosion
Describe intercropping and its benefits for erosion control
Explain crop rotation and its role in soil conservation
Describe the use of shelterbelts to reduce wind erosion
Discuss conservation tillage methods to minimize soil disturbance
Explain terracing techniques for preventing soil erosion on sloping land
Discuss the impact of overgrazing on soil health and erosion
Explain range management practices to prevent overgrazing and preserve native grasses
